title: An Act relative to emergency room procedure for prescribing or dispensing pain medication to certain persons on probation

abstracts.abstract: By Representative McKenna of Sutton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2494) of Joseph D. McKenna relative to procedures for prescribing or dispensing pain medications in emergency rooms to certain persons on probation.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
